title: "Lamda AI Raises $320 Million, Flower Labs $20 Million, WebXR Hubs Shut"
excerpt: "Flower Labs Raises $20 M. Flower’s technology makes it easier for people to use an AI training method called “federated learning,” which allows an AI model to be trained without having all the training data transferred to a central server, which is a security concern. Felicis Ventures led the round."
